intro_text: r_c worries that an apprentice should not be out here alone
success_text: At least this is a good chance to learn the territory
fail_text: r_c gets lost in the territory and doesn't learn anything
decline_text: r_c turns back to camp, deciding that this is a bad idea

intro_text: r_c's mentor assesses them by sending them on a solo hunt
success_text: r_c catches a lot of prey and passes their assessment
fail_text: Hunting is poor and r_c's mentor is disappointed
decline_text: r_c asks their mentor to do the assessment some other time

intro_text: r_c's mentor assesses them by sending them on a solo border patrol
success_text: r_c successfully marks the Clan territory
fail_text: r_c messes up the territory markings and almost starts a border skirmish
decline_text: r_c asks their mentor to do the assessment some other time
